alert.note: Alert for Logan; Mingo (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mingo and southwestern Logan Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chattaroy, or 7 miles north of Williamson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delbarton, Holden, Chattaroy, Mount Gay-Shamrock, Verdunville, Dingess, Myrtle, Lenore and Switzer. This includes Route 119 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
